Multiple Accordion Sets

This page shows an example of multiple accordion sets used on a single page. Each set is built as a separate unordered list <ul> in the code. Each individual accordion still needs its own unique identifiers in order to function properly.

Learn how to add accordions to a set in this video tutorial.
